content: **introductory offer - get $2 off until the end of 2015** a fair isle knit to keep your head toasty and colorful hello this pattern was written for our colorwork knitting class this pattern is worked in the round using the fair isle/stranded colorwork technique the pattern has instructions for both a headband and a beanie please note that a greater amount of mc yarn will be required for the beanie but a 50g ball will be plenty
